reviewText: I got this for my daughter, a serious sushi fan, and while there is nothing wrong with the instructions, per say, it is rather bland watching even for an instructional video. Although we did learn a couple of new tricks, so I won't complain too too much.

This video moves at such a slow pace I barely made it through the first 15 minutes.  After finishing the video I felt like I had wasted my time.  The video does help a bit but you should spend your money elsewhere.  I recommend a video called Ken Sushi.  This video will be of much more help.
